pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 20  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)5 on easy, 8 on normal, 12 on hard, 5 $(l:brewing/effects#wither)Wither Damage$() $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(l:world/structures#fortress)Nether Fortress$()  $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Wither Skeletons$() are immune to fire and the $(l:brewing/effects#wither)$(thing)Wither effect$(). They still seek shade or water during daylight if they are in the $(l:world/dimensions#overworld)$(thing)Overworld$() although they do not burn in sunlight. Like most undead mobs, they sink in $(item)Water$() but do not drown, are healed by $(l:brewing/effects#instant_damage)$(thing)Instant Damage$() and harmed by $(l:brewing/effects#instant_health)$(thing)Instant Health$() effects, are immune to $(l:brewing/effects#regeneration)$(thing)Regeneration$() and $(l:brewing/effects#poison)$(thing)Poison effects$().

$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Bones, 1/3 chance Coal, 2.5% chance for a $(l:rare/mob_heads)$(item)Wither Skeleton Skull$() / 100% chance if killed by a $(l:tips/lightning)$(thing)Charged Creeper$(), 8.5% chance for Equipment  $(br)$(n)XP:$() 5-17
